select.if: select b.*, c.id as contractId, c.number as contractNumber, ct.id as firstPartyId, ct.name as firstPartyName, cf.taxpayer_code as firstPartyTaxpayerCode, cf.addr_phone as firstPartyAddrPhone, cf.bank_account as firstPartyBankAccount, d.id as secondPartyId, d.name as secondPartyName, d.name as secondPartyTaxpayerCode, d.name as secondPartyAddrPhone, d.name as secondPartyBankAccount, up.id as payeeId, up.real_name as payeeName, ua.id as approvalId, ua.real_name as approvalName from t_bill b left join t_contract c on b.contract_id = c.id left join t_customer ct on b.first_party_id = ct.id left join t_financial_info cf on cf.customer_id = ct.id left join tb_dept d on d.id = b.second_party_id left join tb_user up on b.payee_id = up.id left join tb_user ua on b.approval_id = ua.id where b.status = 0 and b.direct = #{direct} order by b.update_time desc limit #{pageStart}, #{pageSize}
